channel.title: PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Call for contributions: Admin API - great start!
item.description: Two months ago, we launched our second Call for Contributions initiative, this time focusing on the Admin API. Weâ€™re excited to share the progress thatâ€™s been made!

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - October 2025
item.description: October has been an exceptional month for the PrestaShop project! We released the first maintenance version of PrestaShop 9, opened registration for our biggest community event of the year, and watched the Admin API contribution initiative gain incredible momentum. Letâ€™s dive into what made this month so special.

item.title: PrestaShop 9.0.1 is available
item.description: The first patch version for PrestaShop 9 is now available! This maintenance release focuses on resolving some of the key issues to ensure a smoother experience for all users.

item.title: PrestaShop Developer Conference 2025: Register now!
item.description: The ecommerce world is advancing at an exciting pace, creating fresh opportunities for developers and businesses. Thatâ€™s why we are excited to announce the third edition of the PrestaShop Developer Conference, taking place on November 19, 2025, in Paris and, for the first time, online.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - September 2025
item.description: Welcome to the September edition of the Core Monthly! This month was buzzing with activity around PrestaShop 9, with the team working on its first patch release and the community stepping up to expand the new Admin API. We also saw some fantastic new tools and improvements, all thanks to dedicated contributors.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - August 2025
item.description: Welcome to the August edition of Core Monthly. This month brought an important security patch for 8.2, a new community feature in the back office, and a fresh call for contributions to expand the Admin API in PrestaShop 9.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.2.3 is available
item.description: PrestaShop 8.2.3 is available. It is a securityâ€‘driven patch release for the 8.2 branch. Its primary goal is to address an email enumeration vulnerability in the back office password reset feature. A handful of low-risk improvements and bug fixes that have already been validated have also been included.

item.title: Meet the PrestaShop Wall of Fame
item.description: From its very first release, PrestaShop has been built and improved thanks to the dedication of its open source community. Today, weâ€™re introducing a new way to celebrate that dedication - directly in your back office.

item.title: Call for contributions: Admin API
item.description: After the success of our first Call for Contributions focused on hooks, itâ€™s time to launch a new round. This time, weâ€™re inviting the community to contribute to one of the most significant changes in PrestaShop 9: the new Admin API.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - July 2025
item.description: We are back with the July edition of the PrestaShop Core Monthly! ðŸŒž

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - July 2025
item.description: On July 30th, 2025, we hosted another Live Update for the PrestaShop Project, highlighting the announcement of the upcoming One Page Checkout (OPC) feature in PrestaShop 9.1. We also covered the current state of the project, recent releases, and ongoing contribution initiatives, including the Admin API.

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update July 2025
item.description: Yet another Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2025 will be hosted on Wednesday, July 30th, 2025, at 4 PM (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: PrestaShop 8.2.2 is available
item.description: PrestaShop 8.2.2 is here! This latest patch version brings a range of updates, addressing reported issues and introducing enhancements to improve the platform for merchants and developers alike.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - June 2025
item.description: We are back with yet another edition of the PrestaShop Core Monthly, your monthly digest of the PrestaShop codebaseâ€™s latest changes and news from the PrestaShop project.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.2.x is now in the extended support phase
item.description: Now that PrestaShop 9.0 is out, here is a focus on maintained branches of the PrestaShop project and what to expect.
